data.title: Florida Native Plant Society (FNPS)
data.text:
Recommended Uses:Can be used as a groundcover in semi-shady areas. Perhaps more interesting than showy. Propagation: Availability:Native nurseries, FNPS plant sales Light: Full Sun, Part Shade Moisture Tolerance:

always floodedextremely dry

(Usually moist, occasional inundation ----- to ----- Not wet but not extremely dry) Moisture Tolerance: Usually moist, occasional inundation ----- to ----- Not wet but not extremely dry Salt Water Flooding Tolerance:Tolerant of occasional/brief inundation such as can occur in storm surges. Salt Spray/ Salty Soil Tolerance:High. Can tolerate significant and ongoing amounts of salty wind and salt spray without injury. Soil or other substrate:Sand
